text7:
Among the well-known cushion foundations, I kept hearing about Banila Co, so I decided to try it out. And let me tell you, it was truly shocking! 

Banila Co is a brand that seems to have very polarized opinions depending on the person, so I was hesitant at first. But it turned out to be a perfect match for me... Even my friends complimented me, saying that Banila Co suits me so well.

Of course, everyone's experience may differ, but for me, it's the type of cushion that takes a long time to get oily, so I could use it for quite a while with occasional touch-ups using powder. I really hope everyone gets a chance to try Banila Co at least once. âœ¨

The Ultimate White Cushion Moisture that I recently bought is slightly more moisturizing and watery compared to other Banila Co cushions, so I recommend considering this aspect before purchasing. I want to express my gratitude to the Banila Co team first. I'm currently going through a phase with a lot of skin troubles and dryness, so I struggled to find a base product that would apply beautifully and naturally... But thanks to the Moisture Cushion, I now have beautifully moisturized and clear skin that I'm extremely satisfied with.
text8:
Among the well-known cushion foundations, I kept hearing about Banila Co, so I decided to try it out. And let me tell you, it was truly shocking! 

Banila Co is a brand that seems to have very polarized opinions depending on the person, so I was hesitant at first. But it turned out to be a perfect match for me... Even my friends complimented me, saying that Banila Co suits me so well.

Of course, everyone's experience may differ, but for me, it's the type of cushion that takes a long time to get oily, so I could use it for quite a while with occasional touch-ups using powder. I really hope everyone gets a chance to try Banila Co at least once. âœ¨

The Ultimate White Cushion Moisture that I recently bought is slightly more moisturizing and watery compared to other Banila Co cushions, so I recommend considering this aspect before purchasing. I want to express my gratitude to the Banila Co team first. I'm currently going through a phase with a lot of skin troubles and dryness, so I struggled to find a base product that would apply beautifully and naturally... But thanks to the Moisture Cushion, I now have beautifully moisturized and clear skin that I'm extremely satisfied with.
